reporter_caption.center: ROSECRANS, et al. v. WHITE, 295 Pa. Super. 564 (1981)

caption.center: Rosecrans, et al. v. White, Appellant.

opinion.posture: Civil proceedings. Equity. Before CARNEY, J. No. 547 Pittsburgh 1980. Appeal from the order of the Court of Common Pleas of Erie County, Civil Division, No. 4306-A-of 1978. Argued January 12, 1981.
opinion.attorneys: Kenneth D. Chestek, for appellant; Vedder J. White, for appellees.
opinion.panel: Before SPAETH, SHERTZ and MONTGOMERY, JJ.
